title: 107 - Billy Tubes Ruins Another Episode
description: On today's show the boys discuss everything under the sun in a packed Pod FOD as they cover Pornhub getting rid of a massive amount of their videos, their favorite Tarantino movies, which actor they'd like to voice over a cartoon of themselves, Mitt having a striking resemblance to Beavis from Beavis and Butthead, Billy Tubes comes in and does his best to ruin the entire episode, Digs makes a new rule for The Pod moving forward, the guys discuss the best acting performance they've seen, and why not judging a book by it's cover without doing a little research is a dangerous game, plus much more. Don't forget to send in your questions and submissions to be featured on the show @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to become a member of McAfee's Mafia and watch the show's on youtube. We appreciate you all, we'll see you Friday.
